Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: kirk m.
Reviews.Content: I have this camera about nine months now and it is really top of the line. I havent had any issues with the camera except the battery strenght indicator sometimes isnt so accurate, I noticed this once when using the camera the indicator was showing about 70% charge but the camera would not focus and it was onlynafter charging it that it started back focusing properly.But all in all super camera greta zoom, good night shots, might be a little slow between shots but no complaints otherwise

Reviews.Title: camera and nature
Reviews.Author: Amenold
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying my new toy. My Nikon P 510, 16.1 MP allows me to better appreciate nature. Nature plus Nikon is happiness.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for the money.
Reviews.Author: PB
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera and great service.  Is a great deal. I would recommend it to anyone.  Very good pictures and very nice video and audio.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: Just as discribed in adArrived next day as stated.Love the camera the pictures are very clear and beautiful. I've had a Kodak that was simler to this one but I have to say my Nikon the pictures are much more clearer <3

Reviews.Title: Buenesima
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Alles
Reviews.Content: Todo lo que esperaba acerca de esta camara y mucho mas.Un zoom impresionante que permite unos acercamientos muy disfrutables

Reviews.Title: My 2nd coolpix
Reviews.Author: Celia
Reviews.Content: The shutter speed is a little slower than my other coolpix but pictures are crisp and clear.  Hesitates when I turn on, have to press button more than once

Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Extendable 8" Tabletop Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
